divs: Sighting DetailsI was asleep at 130 a.m. in the morning and my boyfriend came home . . neither of us drunk or anything, then out of my arcadia door I saw what i thought was a war, blue and white lights, I ducted, then went to totally blue lights a solid light. My boyfriend went to the aracdia door and couldnt get out like it trapped him in then he got out, I dont remember anything after that tell i woke up.
Summary: I looked out my window and saw a war, blue and white lights, then stopped and was frozen
